snippet.title: Aces of Thunder Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW!
🔥 Steam — https://store.steampowered.com/app/2754090/Aces_of_Thunder/
🔥 PlayStation — https://store.playstation.com/concept/10007306

Aces of Thunder is a VR spin-off of the popular online game War Thunder, and this new title is focusing solely on aerial battles of legendary aircraft in the most iconic theaters of war. More than twenty meticulously recreated models will be available to players at launch. The roster includes the American P-51 Mustang and P-63 Kingcobra fighters, the German Bf 109 and Fw 190 fighters, the Soviet IL-2 attack aircraft, the British Spitfire fighter and the Japanese A6M3 Zero. You can admire both the interior and exterior of these beauties, i.e. while walking around them on the airfield, as well as during flight, which the player experiences exclusively from the cockpit, you can quite literally grab the controls with your hands and spin a turn.

Aces of Thunder will be released in the 4th quarter of 2024!

● Official Site — https://acesofthunder.com/
● Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/acesofthunder/
● X — https://x.com/acesofthunder
● Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/acesofthunder/
